name: Grapple (itch)
description:
Grapple is a fast paced mobile game for Android where you use a grapple to swing a hamster around obstacles to the finish line on over 50 levels. There are a bunch of unique environments with lots of different gameplay features to swing through.

Right now grapple is in open beta. The prototype build is available for:

  • Android: Play store open beta
  • Unity web player plugin in Firefox, Safari or Internet Explorer: Web build
  • Or for PC in the download section below!

When you've tried it out join the discord server if you'de like to relay your feedback or discuss the game: Discord open beta discussion
